Application Flags.Name: GATEWAY_PRESENCE
Application Flags.Description: Intent required for bots in 100 or more servers to receive presence_update events

Application Flags.Name: GATEWAY_PRESENCE_LIMITED
Application Flags.Description: Intent required for bots in under 100 servers to receive presence_update events, found in Bot Settings

Application Flags.Name: GATEWAY_GUILD_MEMBERS
Application Flags.Description: Intent required for bots in 100 or more servers to receive member-related events like guild_member_add. See list of member-related events under GUILD_MEMBERS

Application Flags.Name: GATEWAY_GUILD_MEMBERS_LIMITED
Application Flags.Description: Intent required for bots in under 100 servers to receive member-related events like guild_member_add, found in Bot Settings. See list of member-related events under GUILD_MEMBERS

Application Flags.Name: VERIFICATION_PENDING_GUILD_LIMIT
Application Flags.Description: Indicates unusual growth of an app that prevents verification

Application Flags.Name: EMBEDDED
Application Flags.Description: Indicates if an app is embedded within the Discord client (currently unavailable publicly)

Application Flags.Name: GATEWAY_MESSAGE_CONTENT
Application Flags.Description: Intent required for bots in 100 or more servers to receive message content

Application Flags.Name: GATEWAY_MESSAGE_CONTENT_LIMITED
Application Flags.Description: Intent required for bots in under 100 servers to receive message content, found in Bot Settings
